zh: 信驊科技與廣達電腦結盟為軟體合作夥伴
位於新竹科學園區的信驊科技，這家高度創新的fabless Soc –centric IC設計公司於2005年5月很高興地宣布與世界最大的筆記型電腦設計及製造公司─「廣達電腦股份有限公司」協議結盟為軟體合作夥伴。此項協議將開拓一條新的道路 帶領我們向前。
信驊科技董事長林鴻明先生表示：“我們很高興與世界第一大筆電設計製造商廣達電腦成為合作夥伴，我們也非常期待這段合作關係將為信驊科技及廣達電腦帶來無限的可能性。對於新創立的信驊科技，這是一個完美的開始，我也肯定這是更多創新合作的開始。
關於 ASPEED信驊科技股份有限公司“信驊科技”成立於2004年11月，為一家高度創新的fabless半導體公司。致力於提供先進的SOC中央運算產品，包含矽晶片、IP以及相關軟體產品，此產品之應用目標為多媒體、影像與網路功能。欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站 http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
媒體聯絡方式：吳俐俐行銷暨業務部資深行銷專員連絡電話：886-955-988-421Lili_wu@aspeedtech.com
en: ASPEED Allied with Quanta Computer Inc. as a Software Partner

Hsinchu, Taiwan, May, 2005 - ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless SoC-centric IC design house is pleased to announce that Quanta Computer, world’s largest notebook design and manufacturing company has become software partner through agreements.  The deal will forge a new path and move ahead.

“We are happy to be partner with Quanta, world’s largest notebook design and manufacturing company.  We’re excited about the infinite possibilities this partnership will bring to both ASPEED and Quanta, it is a perfect start for us as a new company.  Im sure this is the beginning of many more innovative cooperation.” said Chris Lin President of ASPEED Technology.

About ASPEED Technology Inc.ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless company founded in Nov. 2004, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, devotes itself to providing silicon chips, silicon IPs and software products that enable sophisticated SOC-centric multimedia, graphics and network applications. For more detailed information, please visit ASPEED website at http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
